name: muffintop
description: MuffinTop - Calorie and nutrient tracking application

scripts.build: npm run build -w shared && npm run build -w backend && npm run build -w frontend
scripts.test: npm run test -w backend && npm run test -w frontend
scripts.test:all: npm run test -w backend && npm run test -w frontend && npm run test:e2e -w frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint -w backend && npm run lint -w frontend
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck -w shared && npm run typecheck -w backend && npm run typecheck -w frontend
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/node_modules shared/node_modules backend/dist frontend/dist
scripts.setup: npm install && npm run db:init && npm run usda:import && npm run build
